definition: listless/dispirited/washed out/also written 沒精打彩|没精打彩
essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
color/complexion/looks/variant of 彩[cai3]/variant of 採|采[cai3]

sentences.english: The two mongrels were without spirit at all; bones were the only things breakable about them.
sentences.chinese: 而那兩條雜種狗則沒精打采的，只有一把骨頭。

sentences.english: Several students wereslouching against the wall.
sentences.chinese: 有幾個學生沒精打采地倚在牆上。

sentences.english: The long, hot summer had left me out of health, out of spirits.
sentences.chinese: 漫長炎熱的夏季使我身體不佳，沒精打采。

sentences.english: She walked about listlessly, humming to herself in dejection.
sentences.chinese: 她沒精打采地走來走去，沮喪地低聲哼着。

sentences.english: No slouching, hands out of pockets, and head held up high.
sentences.chinese: 不要沒精打采的，把手從褲兜裏掏出來，把頭擡高。

definition: partner for dating/a date (boyfriend or girlfriend)
lit. as drunk as mud/completely drunk
to ask a question, already knowing the answer
to follow sb closely (idiom)/to keep close to
see 驚慌失措|惊慌失措[jing1 huang1 shi1 cuo4]
to whisper to one another's ear
child bride/girl adopted into a family as future daughter-in-law
